item.description:
Eins, zwei, g'suffa!!! It is Oktoberfest time in Newport!!!!

Unfortunately I will be sailing somewhere in the Caribbean on October 9th (well, maybe that is not so unfortunate after all... :-), but our Bettie is there and has volunteered to "host" this event for us.

For those of you, who have never been to the October Fest, this is a great opportunity to enjoy a fun part of the German culture: German beer songs, German beer, German Volk-dance shows, German food and A LOT of German minded people. I can tell you it has always been a lot of fun. I am sad I am not around this year.

Bettie will meet you at the entrance of the tent at the Newport Yachting Center at around 2 p.m. If you can't make it until then her phone number is 401 523 1930. Tickets are $ 20 at the door.

Take a lot of pictures so we can post them here on the web site.

Have fun all of you!

Viele Gruesse, Hanna
item.how_to_find_us: Look for Bettie with the German flag!
item.name: Oktoberfest in Newport!
